snippet: The Slot Table, designed by Eric Pfeiffer for AMAC, can be used vertically or horizontally.
abstract: Slot Table, created by Eric Pfeiffer based on a simple plastic box design, is being offered by AMAC.
lead_paragraph: The Slot Table, designed by Eric Pfeiffer for AMAC, can be used vertically or horizontally.

headline.seo: From AMAC, a Transparent Plastic Table That Can Be Turned on Its Side
headline.main: Turning the Plastic Box on Its Head
headline.print_headline: Turning the Plastic Box on Its Head
